title: Order Concessions Inventory
description: A food and beverage manager needs to place the weekly order for non-perishable items like popcorn kernels, cups, and napkins.

tasks.description: Review the current inventory levels and the schedule of events for the next two weeks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assesses current stock and future demand.

tasks.description: Calculate the required order quantities for each item based on par levels and expected attendance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the exact quantities to order for each item.

tasks.description: Create purchase orders for the items from the approved vendors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates and sends purchase orders to the appropriate suppliers.
